name: Last Will and Testament: Legacy of these Old Bones
name_original: Last Will and Testament: Legacy of these Old Bones
description:
Play with (1-4) friends and return from the dead and fight your way through a procedurally generated market place. Help survivors and destroy the crystals that are bringing the dark army into your world! Features over 20 weapons and an original soundtrack and voice over!

This was done as a 2-day project for Pizza jam 2019 and uses the them found there (Name #33 Last Will and Testament). We had a lot of fun making it and we hope you enjoy!
